sentence.Network_en: By-laws are to make it illegal to smoke in public.
sentence.Network_cn: 地方法规将规定在公共场合抽烟为非法。

sentence.Network_en: Discrimination by employers on the grounds of race and nationality was illegal.
sentence.Network_cn: 雇主以种族或国籍为由歧视员工是非法的。

sentence.Network_en: He repeated that he had never knowingly taken illegal drugs.
sentence.Network_cn: 他再三强调自己从没有故意吸毒。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from French illégal or medieval Latin illegalis, from Latin in- 'not' + legalis 'according to the law'

entry.tran: 不合法的;非法的;违反规则的
entry.def: If something is illegal, the law says that it is not allowed.

example.ex: It is illegal to intercept radio messages...
example.tran: 拦截无线电报是非法的。

example.ex: Birth control was illegal there until 1978...
example.tran: 1978 年以前那里节育是非法的。

entry.tran: (移民)非法入境的;(劳工)非法务工的
entry.def: Illegal immigrants or workers have travelled into a country or are working without official permission.

means.word_mean: 1. prohibited by law or by official or accepted rules;

auth_sentence.content: The settlements are considered illegal by the international community.
auth_sentence.res_content: The settlements are considered illegal by the international community.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The settlements are considered illegal by the international community.

auth_sentence.content: They sell drugs and indulge in other illegal activities.
auth_sentence.res_content: They sell drugs and indulge in other illegal activities.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They sell drugs and indulge in other illegal activities.

auth_sentence.content: Exactly how many illegal items, unfit for terrorism?
auth_sentence.res_content: Exactly how many illegal items, unfit for terrorism?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Exactly how many illegal items, unfit for terrorism?

stems_affixes.word_buile: il不+legal合法的→adj.非法的
il不+legitimate合法的→adj.不合法的,私生的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 法律的,法定的;合法的,正当的
stems_affixes.word_buile: leg法律+al……的→adj.法律的,法定的;合法的,正当的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 合法的, 合理的, 正统的
stems_affixes.word_buile: leg法律+itm+ate表形容词→adj.合法的, 合理的, 正统的
il不+legible可读的→adj.难读的,难认的
legend[n.传说,传奇;图例]+ary……的→adj.传说的,传奇的
leg讲,读,说+ible能……的→能够读的
de加强+leg法律+ate人,也可表示动词→加强法律之人→代表

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不法, 私生, 反常, 不合逻辑
stems_affixes.word_buile: illegitimate[adj.不合法的,私生的]+cy表名词→n.不法, 私生, 反常, 不合逻辑

stems_affixes.value_cn: 合法,墨守陈规,法律上的义务
stems_affixes.word_buile: legal[adj.法律的,法定的;合法的,正当的]+ity表名词→n.合法,墨守陈规,法律上的义务

stems_affixes.value_cn: 学院,高等专科学校,大学
stems_affixes.word_buile: col共同+leg讲,读,说+e→共同说,共同读的地方→大学
leg讲,读,说+end→讲出的东西→传奇的故事;引申为地图的图例

stems_affixes.value_cn: 功课,课;一堂课,一节课;[常复]课程;教训
stems_affixes.word_buile: less=leg讲,读,说+on表名词→讲话,教训→课
de加强+leg法律+ate人,也可表示动词→加强法律之人→代表
re反+leg法律+ate表动词→反法律的人被放逐
al再+leg讲,读,说+e→一再讲→宣称

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"使……,成为,进入,再"; 2. 放在同辅音词根前表示"不,无"

stems_affixes.word_buile: illusion[[n.幻觉]]男→adj.虚幻的
il不,无+legal合法的→adj.非法的
il不,无+legible可读的→adj.难读的,难认的
il不,无+liberal宽大的→adj.气量狭窄的,吝啬的
il不,无+licit合法的, 正当的→adj.违法的,违禁的
il不,无+limit限制+able……的→adj.无限的
il不,无+literate有文化的→adj.不识字的
il不,无+logical逻辑的→adj.不合逻辑的
il使……,成为,进入,再+lus玩弄+ion表名词→被[幻觉]玩弄→幻觉
il使……,成为,进入,再+lumin光+ate表动词→使…光明→说明
il使……,成为,进入,再+lustr=lust光+ate表动词→使…光明→说明

Sentence.sentence: He obtained Monsanto's patented seeds by illegal means.
Its schools will be overwhelmed by the growing number of illegal immigrants.
At the heart of the debate over illegal immigration lies one key question: are immigrants good or bad for the economy

sentences.en: It was an illegal act and will lead to your arrest.
sentences.cn: 这是非法行为, 足以将你送入监狱。

sentences.en: In this sentence the writer uses an illegal construction.
sentences.cn: 在本句中, 作者使用了一个不合语法的结构。

sentences.en: He never does anything that is illegal.
It is illegal to park your car here.
sentences.cn: 把车停在这里是违法的。

sentences.en: It's illegal for people under 17 to drive a car in Britain.
sentences.cn: 在英国, 不满17岁的人驾驶车辆是违法的。
